amendment.description: To provide for the conveyance of land to the city of Las Vegas, Nevada, for the construction of affordable housing for seniors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1733 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1733 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S11625-11629; text: CR S11625) To provide for the conveyance of land to the city of Las Vegas, Nevada, for the construction of affordable housing for seniors.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1733 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1733 proposed by Senator Reid.
